workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.23262158082835144 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.18464373075652868 --weight-decay 0.0009573454292505186 --lr 1.3006999882412492e-05 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 104422 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.058799379491396936 --max-update 3500000 --max-epoch 15 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
